job.title: Apple Pay - Software Engineer (Payments)
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brAt Apple new ideas have a way of becoming phenomenal products services and customer experiences very quickly You bring passion and dedication to your job and theres no telling what you could accomplish   brbrbrWe are building the next generation systems powering Apple Pay Working alongside a hardworking team of engineers our initiative to build the strategic elements of the Apple Pay stack enabling first to market features that differentiate our productsbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong br5 years of professional experience as a software engineerbrbrProven knowledge of Algorithms amp Data StructuresbrbrHardworking problem solver building the best solutions for the most meaningful problemsbrbrAbility to communicate thoughtfully demonstrating problemsolving skills and a learning attitude to build longterm relationshipsbrbrWorking knowledge of governancesecurity concepts and technologies including encryption anonymization PCI PII ISO8583 etcbrbrHandson software development experience with Java CC Go or similar languagebrbrExperience developing distributed systemsbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brWe are looking for a team member with a strong foundation in computer science theory and industry experience In this role you will design develop and deliver components of a distributed system that is key to the Apple Pay stack  brbrbrYou will have a proven ability to seek problems interest in continuous learning and digging deep into the domain when necessary   brbrbrJob functions include  brbr Multifunctional collaboration throughout the entire software lifecycle brbr Prioritization design and implementation of scalable resilient distributed systems brbr Participating in design sessions and code reviews with peers to elevate the quality of engineering across the organizationbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBSc or MS in Computer Science or related technical field equivalent work experience will be consideredbrbr brstrongAdditional Requirementsbrstrong brThis role may require occasional international traveltransatlantic travelbrbr brRole Number 200215776brbr
